request.description: Create new purchase order. PO number is auto-generated.
Get list of all purchase orders
Update PO status. Valid values: draft, pending, approved
Delete purchase order (only draft or pending status)
Create GRN from approved PO. GRN number is auto-generated.
Create dispatch order. Stock is validated and reduced automatically.

query.description: Options: pending, assigned, in_transit, delivered, cancelled

request.description: Update dispatch status through workflow: pending → assigned → in_transit → delivered
Create reusable QC template for products
Get list of all QC templates
Get QC templates for specific SKU
Delete QC template (soft delete - sets isActive to false)
Create return order. Return type is auto-detected from reason.
Get list of all return orders

query.description: Options: damaged, expired, wrong_item, overstock, other

request.description: Approve return order. Inventory is automatically reduced.
Get list of all field agents

query.description: Options: active, low_stock, overstock, expired, quarantine, archived

request.description: Update inventory item. Status and age are auto-calculated.
Get list of archived inventory items
Archive multiple inventory items at once
Unarchive multiple inventory items at once
Get expense summary with category breakdown and payment status
Update expense. Note: Updating amount/category/date resets status to pending.
Update payment status: paid, unpaid, partially_paid
Get monthly expense trend data for charts
Get list of available report types

query.description: Options: inventory_summary, purchase_orders, inventory_turnover, qc_summary, efficiency, stock_ageing

request.description: Generate any report type using generic endpoint
